results.1-1: 1 Mook is firing incendiary ammunition (CP:R page 346), but only has 10 rounds.
results.2-2: Add 2 additional Mooks to the encounter at the start of the 2nd Round.
results.3-3: 2 Mooks are currently experiencing the primary effect of Black Lace (CP:R page 227).
results.4-4: Give them Medium Armorjack that’s been Tech upgraded, removing the Armor Penalty.
results.5-5: Give them an additional 600eb of Cyberware.
results.7-7: Add an additional Mook of a different type to the encounter.
results.8-8: Add 2 Mooks to the encounter. Give each a Critical Injury to the head.
results.9-9: Add 1 additional Mook to the encounter at the start of Rounds 2, 3, and 4.
results.10-10: 1 Mook has an SMG, no sense of self preservation, an Autofire Skill Base of 16, and no head armor.
